metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0984 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Users with the capability to configure badge criteria (teachers and managers by default) were able to configure course badges with profile field criteria, which should only be available for site badges.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
